content: The only issues I have remaining in my spreadsheet say that I have invalid email addresses for some users, but I don't see a way to find users email addresses in Jira? Am I missing it?

The message you get should look like this:
21. Jira email address (someone@address.com) does not match that of commenter

The address specified is what Jira expects it to be. Are you getting a different message?
Okay, that takes care of almost all of them, I have one error outstanding, a missing user.
How do I get a user added to support that comment?
I can add them if you have name and email Bryn.
Done. And yes, the process (until such time as users submit their own ballots) is to ping Josh or David or I
Just wanted to post this bit of joy:
Successfully loaded spreadsheet. 31 issues created. (FHIR-26325 thru FHIR-26355) and added votes to 51 pre-existing issues
Thanks so much for all your help, and I see the permissions issue has been resolved! Thank you!
